name: Plany Plane
description:
In the game you are controlling a plane by drawing intricate path curves to evade various obstacles.

Support service: mentality.dev@gmail.com

App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/plany-plane/id1392276669

Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Mentality.Dev.PlanyPlane

GAME FEATURES:

— 3+ world (Forest, Snow, Lava +++) 

— more than 28 achievements 

— unique painting-based controls

— high-quality support and super updates! 

— 3+ different planes 

— great sound and music 

— 45+ Levels! 

— truly challenging game
